mapper.select: select a.b_no, a.b_type, a.b_title,a.b_count ,b.mem_no, c.s_name, a.b_content from board a, member b, store c where a.b_no=#{b_no} and b.s_no=c.s_no and a.mem_no = b.mem_no
select a.r_no, c.s_name, a.r_content, a.r_date from review a , member b , store c where a.b_no=#{b_no} and a.mem_no = b.mem_no and b.s_no = c.s_no order by r_no asc
mapper.update: update board set b_count=b_count+1 where b_no=#{b_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where b_type=#{b_type}
mapper.update: update board set b_type=#{b_type}, b_title=#{b_title}, b_content=#{b_content} where b_no=#{b_no}
